co.louiscap.lib.compat

Interface NamedValue<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of value being held
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LexicalToken

    public interface NamedValue<T>
    A data structure for associating a value with a name and optional namespace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deserialise(java.lang.String data)
      Take a string that represents a NamedValue (presumably created by serialise() and set this NamedValue instance to be equal to it.
      NamedValue fromString(java.lang.String data)
      Take a string that represents a NamedValue (presumably created by serialise() and creates a new NamedValue instance (of the same type as the implementation) from it
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the value.
      java.lang.String getNamesapce()
      Gets the namespace that the value exists within.
      T getValue()
      Gets the value that this object represents
      java.lang.String serialise()
      Create a string that represents this object, in a format that can be reversed with either deserialise(java.lang.String) or fromString(java.lang.String)
      void setValue(T val)
      Sets the value represented by this object
      java.lang.String toString()
      Create a string that represents this object, in a format that can be reversed with either deserialise(java.lang.String) or fromString(java.lang.String)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the value.
        Returns:
        The name of the value

      • getNamesapce

        java.lang.String getNamesapce()
        Gets the namespace that the value exists within. This allows multiple leaves with the same name to represent different items
        Returns:
        The namespace for this value

      • getValue

        T getValue()
        Gets the value that this object represents
        Returns:
        The value that this object represents

      • setValue

        void setValue(T val)
        Sets the value represented by this object
        Parameters:
        val - The new value to store in this object

      • serialise

        java.lang.String serialise()
        Create a string that represents this object, in a format that can be reversed with either deserialise(java.lang.String) or fromString(java.lang.String)
        Returns:
        A string that represents the current state of the NamedValue

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Create a string that represents this object, in a format that can be reversed with either deserialise(java.lang.String) or fromString(java.lang.String)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string that represents the current state of the NamedValue

      • deserialise

        void deserialise(java.lang.String data)
        Take a string that represents a NamedValue (presumably created by serialise() and set this NamedValue instance to be equal to it.
        Parameters:
        data - A String that represents a NamedValue of the same type as the implementation

      • fromString

        NamedValue fromString(java.lang.String data)
        Take a string that represents a NamedValue (presumably created by serialise() and creates a new NamedValue instance (of the same type as the implementation) from it
        Parameters:
        data - A String that represents a NamedValue of the same type as the implementation
        Returns:
        A new NamedValue that mirrors the provided string data
